contents.text: Thank you for calling Culture Amp in San Francisco, your partner in driving employee engagement through actionable feedback.
For assistance with creating and launching employee engagement surveys, press '1'.
To speak with a survey design specialist, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a survey design specialist.

navigationGoals: Get guidance from a design specialist to develop tailored engagement survey questions.
I need guidance designing an engagement survey focused on the experiences of military veterans.
I need to design a custom employee engagement survey with advanced question branching and Likert-scale metrics.
I need to speak with someone about designing my employee survey questions.
I need help designing my student group’s engagement survey to gather actionable feedback on lab collaboration.

contents.text: To schedule or launch a survey, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our survey launch team.

navigationGoals: Schedule and launch our quarterly employee engagement survey this week.
I’m ready to schedule and launch our new employee engagement survey across the organization.
I’d like to schedule and launch our next quarterly engagement survey, including setting up automated reminder workflows.
I want to schedule and launch an engagement survey for my team.
I want to schedule and send out my physics lab group’s engagement survey.

contents.text: For help with analyzing feedback and generating insights, press '2'.
To discuss analytics and interpreting employee feedback, press '1'.
Please hold while we transfer you to an analytics expert.

navigationGoals: Discuss and interpret the latest survey feedback with an analytics expert.
I want help interpreting the results from our latest engagement survey to improve team morale.
I want to discuss the analytics on our latest feedback and interpret the data to extract actionable insights.
I need help interpreting survey feedback and analytics.
I need assistance interpreting the feedback data from my recently completed engagement survey.

contents.text: For custom report and dashboard setup assistance, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with a reporting specialist.

navigationGoals: Set up a custom engagement dashboard to track team scores over time.
I need to set up custom dashboards and reports to track our engagement metrics over time.
I need assistance configuring a custom dashboard with dynamic visualizations and KPIs for our engagement reports.
I need assistance setting up custom reports and dashboards.
I’d like to set up a custom dashboard to visualize the survey feedback results.
